title: Bug 112458: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer.
description: Description: Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.
OB: Customers may be confused as they might mistake it for the Master Page Editor and end up setting properties without first clicking on the Master Page viewer.
EB: When switching to the Master Page, the Property Editor should update to display the Master Page properties.
SR: Switch to the Master Page and verify that the Property Editor reflects the properties of the Master Page instead of the layout items.
